welcome_message_body: Welcome to Lower Saucon, the charming city known for its beautiful parks, vibrant culture, and friendly locals. We hope you enjoy your time here and take the opportunity to explore all that our city has to offer. Welcome!

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lehigh Valley International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A is dedicated to domestic flights operated by major airlines.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B is dedicated to regional and international flights operated by smaller airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Upper Bucks Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Doylestown Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Doylestown Airport is exclusively for private flights and charter services.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Willow Grove NAS Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Willow Grove NAS Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Pottstown/Limerick Airport serves domestic flights and is equipped with modern amenities for passenger comfort.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.
